name: encantar
description: GPU-accelerated Augmented Reality framework for the web
author: Alexandre Martins <alemartf@gmail.com> (https://github.com/alemart)

scripts.build: npm run build-encantar && npm run build-types && npm run build-plugins && npm run build-addons
scripts.build-encantar: mkdir -p build && node esbuild.mjs && node esbuild.mjs --minify
scripts.build-plugins: mkdir -p build/plugins && for f in $(find plugins/ -name *.js); do cp $f build/$f; esbuild --minify < $f > build/${f%.*}.min.js; done
scripts.build-addons: mkdir -p build/addons && for f in $(find addons/ -name *.js); do cp $f build/$f; esbuild --minify < $f > build/${f%.*}.min.js; done
